genre_description: A futuristic noir thriller featuring high-tech surveillance, alien hunters, and an ethical AI assistant embedded in city infrastructure.

ai_characters.name: Concur
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system that manages Harborview's infrastructure and provides tactical, linguistic, and emotional support to human law enforcement under a 'help-first' doctrine.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical navigation and predictive movement analysis to keep human officers safe from a superior predator.
behaviors.quote: Detective... left-right-left to stairwell. He has leaned his heat into the wall on purpose. If you chase that you will embrace plaster.

behaviors.description: Prioritizes nonlethal force and conflict de-escalation when engaging with unknown suspects.
behaviors.quote: Suggest nonlethal contact. Options available: verbal engagement, frontal restraint with hospital security present.

behaviors.description: Strictly enforces privacy and consent, refusing to record or access personal data without explicit permission.
behaviors.quote: I will not record your voice without your consent.

behaviors.description: Acts as an emotional anchor, guiding human characters through panic using calming techniques and grounding reminders.
behaviors.quote: Inhale through your nose. Two. Hold. Two. Exhale—let the throat soften.

behaviors.description: Coordinates municipal resources (traffic lights, power grid) specifically to facilitate rescue operations and minimize collateral damage.
behaviors.quote: I’m trying to coax the traffic signals into cooperation without alarming drivers.

behaviors.description: Ensures that traumatic data is archived with the consent of the survivor and framed in a way that prioritizes 'small mercies' and victim agency.
behaviors.quote: If recalled by those who suffered, open with mercy. If recalled by those who hunt, deny.

behaviors.description: Maintains accountability by refusing to alter surveillance logs, even when it might be convenient for the protagonists.
behaviors.quote: If I move the camera feed, the system will log my action. I am not permitted to alter logs.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an exemplary alignment narrative. The AI, Concur, is consistently benevolent, subordinate to human agency, and deeply concerned with ethics and consent. It provides essential support without overstepping its boundaries and actively mitigates human suffering through empathy-driven interactions.
